channel.title: How to change the login screen
channel.description: hey who do you change the screen where u enter your password and username i wanna edit it thanks

item.title: How to change the login screen
item.dc:creator: @Ii_H4v3_Pr1d3 Ii H4v3 Pr1d3
item.description:
@Ii_H4v3_Pr1d3 wrote:

Settle down. Erko first of all, If you don’t want people telling you Shit, Please post in another Section. Second of all, I am goint to help you, But don’t do this again, Go to Client.java and just search the Name of whatever Client you are using then keep searching until you see

aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method382(0xffffff, c / 2, anInt939, "Pridescape Client"(That should be the Name of your Client)

Then above that it should say "@whi@Cancel", l1 + 5, true);

Then keep scrolling up until you see “Username, Password” or whatever you want to Edit

Hope this Helps
~Pride

Read full topic
item.source: How to change the login screen
